columns.name: generation
columns.description: Generation for a given text prompt.

columns.name: likelihood
columns.description: The likelihood of the generated text.

columns.name: token_likelihoods
columns.description: The likelihood of the generated tokens/prompt.

columns.name: prompt
columns.description: The prompt to get generations for, encoded as a string.

columns.name: settings
columns.description: Settings is a JSONB object that accepts any of the generate API request parameters.
